Description: Provision Azure resources: SQL DB, Blob Storage, Redis, Service Bus, Key Vault, App Insights

Azure AD B2C integration, OAuth 2.0, JWT validation, RBAC middleware, role seeding
Create all SQL tables, EF migrations, seed data (roles, controls), create indexes
Create SQL tables with JSON columns (TransferMERData, ApplicationMetadata, UserActivityLogs)
Create blob containers (evidence-files, template-files), lifecycle policies, SAS tokens, soft delete
GET /users/me, GET /users, POST /users/{userId}/roles, Azure AD sync
GET /controls, POST /controls, seed MER-13/MER-14/ROCC/EUC controls
GET /templates, POST /templates (multipart), PUT /templates/{id}, DELETE /templates/{id}

GET /transfers/{id}/requirements, PUT /requirements/{id}, auto-create requirements on submission
POST /evidence (multipart), upload to Blob Storage, generate SAS tokens, virus scanning
GET /transfers/{id}/evidence, GET /evidence/queue, GET /evidence/{id}/download, preview
POST /evidence/{id}/review, support APPROVE/REJECT/ESCALATE, update statuses, create audit trail
POST /transfers/{id}/review, review entire MER submission, attachment decisions, overall decision
POST /transfers/{id}/escalate, POST /evidence/{id}/escalate, support Legal/Business, tag authorities
POST /transfers/{id}/deputize, assign to Deputy-Legal/Deputy-Business, filter by assignedDeputy
Automatic audit logging middleware, GET /transfers/{id}/audit-trail, GET /evidence/{id}/audit-trail, store IP/user agent
GET /notifications, POST /notifications (internal), PUT /notifications/{id}/read, in-app notifications
Azure Communication Services, email templates (approval/rejection/escalation), background job with Service Bus
Microsoft Graph API integration, send Teams messages, Adaptive Cards for notifications
Create Outlook calendar events for SLA deadlines, task integration
GET /sla/configurations, PUT /sla/configurations/{id}, configure per control type
Background job to calculate SLA status, auto-create SLATracking, update status (ON_TRACK/APPROACHING/BREACHED), send notifications
GET /sla/breaches, dashboard data for SLA metrics
GET /external/applications (from SERA), GET /external/applications/{swcId}, POST /external/sync, cache in SQL ApplicationMetadata
Same as K1 but for iSAC system
Same as K1 but for Cumulus system
Application validation checks
Scheduled job (daily) to sync all applications, Azure Functions Timer Trigger
GET /analytics/dashboard, aggregate stats (pending/approved/rejected), performance metrics
GET /analytics/compliance-report, generate PDF/Excel reports, export to Blob Storage
Step-by-step wizard, template selection/prefill, evidence upload, form validation
My Transfers view, SLA tracking display, escalation button, audit trail modal
Evidence queue, MER review panel, template upload, review workflows
Escalated items view, review panel with escalation info, deputy assignments
Similar to Legal dashboard, business-escalated items
Azure DevOps pipelines, build/test/deploy, environment configs, automated testing
